Forget Fliq's hand being near his gun in my last post, I forgot he's 
in beast mode.

::Fliq::

Turning toward where his scanners reported that a bot was functional, 
Fliq takes a few steps forward. He looks ahead of him, seeing a large 
bot laying on the ground, in stasis lock. Fliq walks up to the bot, 
noting that he was Decepticon.

"Lets get you to a CR," he says, knowing the Decepticon probably 
wouldn't hear him, and slings Strafe onto his back with alot of 
difficulty. The large fox takes off back toward the CF, sending a 
transmission to Iron Raptor.

"Commander," the transmission read, "There's quite a large wreck at my 
position. You might want to send a few bots to salvage this place."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Fliq::
>

been 
> a while since he'd seen such a wreckage, probably not since his ship 
> had crashed on the moon. He cautiously approaches, looking around 
the 
> wreck, and the one good shuttle, to see if there was anyone
